script.title: ping-recorder.slax
script.author: travisohara
script.synopsis: Record ping data as accounting data
script.description: This script performs pings to a configured set of hosts and records the results of the ping in an accounting profile file. The function of this script is controlled by two apply-macros. The "control" macro controls the operation of the script, and the "targets" macro lists the hostname or ip address which the script should ping. The control macro lists the output file, which must be a configured accounting profile file, as well as the layout name and the number of pings per attempt.
